title: Google Links
description: Designed and created an open-source web application that improved productivity for researchers. The application scrapes google search data and parse it into an excel sheet according to the research requirement.
stack: React, JSX, JavaScript, HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Firebase, Figma, Postman

title: Photo Gallery
description: Designed and developed a web application for photography enthusiasts to share their photos. The software displays photographs from a database in a gallery along with the user's profile photo.
stack: React, JavaScript, Nodejs, ExpressJs, SQL, MySQL, HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, AWS, Figma, Postman

title: Tweet Generator
description: Launched an open-source web application to make customized tweets. The user fills out input forms, which updates and renders the tweet display asynchronously.

title: Portfolio
description: Created a React website to showcase my work and share more details about myself. It contains my experience, skills, projects, and other relevant information.
stack: React, JSX, TailwindCSS, Firebase, HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Figma
